title: Manoharam Kundan Jhumkaalu: Emerald & Diamond Cascade Earrings
materials: South Sea Pearl. Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lustrous sheen.
features: Features a three-tiered design. The top section displays a floral motif with emerald center, followed by intricate Kundan setting in a 'lotus' design and finally a delicate Jhumka bell shape with a South Sea pearl droplet. The Kundan setting is meticulously handcrafted, showcasing traditional Telugu artistry.
occasions: Half-Saree Function). Can also be styled with modern outfits for a touch of ethnic elegance.
description: This 'Manoharam' (Beautiful) Jhumka set is a testament to timeless South Indian craftsmanship. The intricate Kundan work, combined with the radiant emerald and lustrous pearl, creates a piece that is both classic and contemporary. A valuable addition to any jewelry collection, embodying the rich cultural heritage of Hyderabad. Features exceptional durability and design that will stand the test of time.
